messages.title: Walthamstow: Our Community, Our Cause
messages.content: For too long in Walthamstow: we've shared horror stories of our local NHS. We called for change. We were told to wait. When it's your family in trouble, patients struggling to get appointments with doctors, and our surgeries and community services are crumbling, you can't wait.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to repeal the hated Health and Social Care Act.
Investment in GP practices, and joined-up mental, social and public-health services.
Fight for affordable and quality housing for all in Walthamstow.

issues.health: NHS is a priority â€“ determined the needs of patients must come first. Labour Government will build an NHS fit for the 21st century, free at the point of use.

housing.content: Fight for affordable and quality housing for all in Walthamstow.

leaflet.personalStatement: Above all, I am determined the needs of patients must come first.
